Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the NCAA Championship game between Virginia and Texas Tech, the upcoming NBA Playoffs, why more people are treating gambling like an investment, early season MLB hits and misses, and why Johnny Football suddenly wants to be called "John."
